original_text: Surely there is a medicine in Gilead. There is a doctor there who can make my dear people better. But my people are still ill. Why are they not better? Surely there is a medicine in Gilead. There is a doctor there who can make my dear people better. But my people are still ill. Why are they not better? Surely there is a medicine in Gilead.
korean_text: 길르앗에는 유향이 있지 아니한가 그 곳에는 의사가 있지 아니한가 딸 내 백성이 치료를 받지 못함은 어찌 됨인고

sentences.original_text: Surely there is a medicine in Gilead.
who can make my dear people better.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 나의 사랑하는 백성을 나을 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: But my people are still ill.

who can make my dear people better.
